On this page

The Natural Scale ‚Äã

SenangStart uses natural adjectives that map to physical objects you can visualize.

The Philosophy ‚Äã

Instead of arbitrary numbers, think of physical objects:

KeywordSizeMental Model
none0pxNo space
tiny4pxü™® Pebble ‚Äî Borders, small offsets
small8pxüì¶ Matchbox ‚Äî Group related items
medium16pxüì± Smartphone ‚Äî Standard default
big32pxüíª Laptop ‚Äî Separate sections
giant64pxüö™ Door ‚Äî Layout divisions
vast128pxüè† House ‚Äî Hero sections

Using the Scale ‚Äã

When to use each size ‚Äã

tiny (4px) ‚Äî For subtle details

  • Icon spacing within buttons
  • Border widths
  • Small visual offsets
html
<button space="p-x:small p-y:tiny">
  <icon /> Button
</button>

small (8px) ‚Äî For grouping related items

  • Gap between label and input
  • Spacing between avatar and name
  • Tight list items
html
<div layout="flex col" space="g:small">
  <label>Email</label>
  <input type="email" />
</div>

medium (16px) ‚Äî The standard default

  • Card padding
  • Form field margins
  • Standard component spacing
html
<div space="p:medium">
  Standard card content
</div>

big (32px) ‚Äî For separating distinct sections

  • Between header and content
  • Between form groups
  • Between major UI blocks
html
<header space="m-b:big">Page Title</header>
<main>Content separated from header</main>

giant (64px) ‚Äî For layout divisions

  • Between page sections
  • Major structural breaks
  • Desktop navigation padding
html
<section space="p-y:giant">
  Major page section
</section>

vast (128px) ‚Äî For hero sections and major spacing

  • Hero section padding
  • Large decorative spacing
  • Full-bleed sections
html
<section space="p:vast" visual="bg:dark">
  <h1>Welcome to the App</h1>
</section>

Natural Language Mapping ‚Äã

When talking about spacing adjustments, use natural language:

You say...Action
"tighten it up"Scale DOWN (medium ‚Üí small ‚Üí tiny)
"compact"Use small or tiny
"give it air"Scale UP (medium ‚Üí big ‚Üí giant)
"breathe"Increase spacing
"spacious"Use big or giant
"cramped"Too much tiny/small, increase scale

Customizing the Scale ‚Äã

Override defaults in senangstart.config.js:

javascript
export default {
  theme: {
    spacing: {
      'tiny': '2px',      // Tighter tiny
      'huge': '256px',    // Add custom scale
      'massive': '512px'  // Even bigger!
    }
  }
}

Use your custom scales:

html
<section space="p:huge">Huge padding</section>
<div space="m-b:massive">Massive margin</div>
